name: Dragon's Journey
description:
Dragon’s Journey is a 3D platforming exploration game where Ruby, a little red dragon, is teleporting around the magical land in order to gather all the brightly colored gems scattered around the world.

Ruby’s a baby dragon, so he can’t fly very high and he doesn’t know how to swim. He’ll have to jump to get to every gem and avoid falling into water and other dangers.

Credits:

Level and Environment Design- Amber Smith
